backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, radio stream availability checks, request logging, and push subscription storage using Maps and OutCall HTTP requests.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level product features to associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files, including navigation, hooks, styling, and PWA behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Debug notes explaining a failing TypeScript build caused by Node.js typings used in browser code, with affected lines listed.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining PWA metadata, theme color, icons, Google Cast SDK, and a fallback recovery UI if React fails to mount.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and a shortcut for quickly starting the live stream.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling asset caching, cache version cleanup, and push notifications with detailed logging and icon caching.
frontend/README-verify.md: Short guide describing how to run the frontend verification script before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node script that checks for browser-incompatible TypeScript types, runs type checks, and validates asset paths before frontend deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component defining navigation, playback logic, lifecycle handling, and an error boundary for UI recovery.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button that starts or stops casting and shows device and connection state.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt logic that detects platform, handles beforeinstallprompt events, and shows platform-specific install guides.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar with Home, Shows, and Settings tabs.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Mini audio player showing track info, album art, and a play/pause button.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Volume slider that syncs with an audio element and updates its volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: UI panel for enabling push notifications, showing subscription state, errors, and permission guidance.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form for submitting song or shout-out requests with validation and backend submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner that prompts users to refresh or reset when a service worker error or update is detected.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button with Web Share API support and a fallback modal for copying the URL.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Show card displaying image, metadata, genres, and schedule with click handling.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Live status badge with animated ping and icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Small animated ping indicator for on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays styled now‑playing notifications with icons based on notification type.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Mock data defining the Show interface and a list of sample shows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbumArtBackground: Hook managing album‑art background loading with preloading, fallback handling, and state persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles audio resume logic on visibility, focus, and bfcache events to restore playback when the app becomes active.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast API initialization, session handling, device availability, and starting/stopping casting for a stream URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Stores and toggles a boolean favorite-station flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity login, state management, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Tracks now-playing changes, deduplicates events, manages browser notification permissions, and triggers track/mix/live notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles push subscription creation, permission requests, backend storage, and unsubscribe logic using a service worker.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes queries and mutations for stream URL retrieval, availability checks, now-playing data polling, and request submissions.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, updates, errors, and reset logic including cache clearing and reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Provides a countdown timer that pauses audio and can be started or canceled.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and releases the screen wake lock based on activity, with visibility handling and cleanup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables plus responsive album‑art background and overlay styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Displays show listings with genre and day filters and renders ShowCards or a no‑results state.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Renders the live radio screen with artwork, now‑playing info, playback controls, and favorite handling.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Displays the current track with artwork, playback controls, volume, and a sleep timer overlay. Handles play/pause actions, loading states, and background visuals.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Provides settings for notifications plus information about Mawalking Radio and contact links. Uses cards and buttons to structure content sections.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Shows detailed info for a selected show including image, schedule, genres, and actions like adding to calendar. Pulls mock data and triggers ICS file generation.
Captures early startup errors and displays a recovery overlay if critical issues occur. Aggregates resource, script, and rejection errors for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Wraps Google Analytics event tracking with safety checks. Provides helpers for play, pause, and cast-related analytics events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates downloadable ICS calendar files for scheduled shows. Computes next show occurrence and formats dates for calendar standards.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Validates and normalizes artwork URLs, ensuring HTTPS and handling relative or protocol‑relative paths. Returns a clean absolute URL or null.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, screens, and animations, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app design goals, required images, architecture notes, and existing feature definitions for a mobile-first Mawalking Radio redesign.
